snippet.title: LittleBigPlanet 2: Adventure Trailer (LBP2)
snippet.description:
Sackboy's craft world is in danger, and only Sackboy can save it! Join Sackboy and an all new amazing and imaginative cast of characters in his grandest adventure yet!

http://us.playstation.com/games-and-media/games/littlebigplanet-2-ps3.html

LittleBigPlanet 2 ©2010 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Developed by Media Molecule.  LittleBigPlanet is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe
